mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LOGIN_LOG ( EMAIL, STATUS, IP_ADDRESS, USER_AGENT, CREATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{status}, #{ip}, #{userAgent}, SYSTIMESTAMP )
mapper.select: SELECT LOG_ID, EMAIL, STATUS, IP_ADDRESS, USER_AGENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATED_AT FROM LOGIN_LOG ORDER BY LOG_ID DESC
